post:
Hi Folks,

A short run **24 hours only** KVM storage offer in Phoenix for you.

Plans:

---

* 1 CPU Core (Use upto 50% 24x7)
* 2 GB Ram
* 1000 GB Disk space
* 2 TB Bandwidth @ 1 gbit (shared - unmetered inbound)
* 1IPv4 address

Price: €25 /year
Link: https://clients.inceptionhosting.com/cart.php?a=add&pid=194
CODE for 50% discount: PHX4AUG21

---

* 1 CPU Core (Dedicated Use 100% 24x7)
* 2 GB Ram
* 2000 GB Disk space
* 4 TB Bandwidth @ 1 gbit (shared - unmetered inbound)
* 1IPv4 address

Price: €50 /year
Link: https://clients.inceptionhosting.com/cart.php?a=add&pid=195
CODE for 50% discount: PHX4AUG21

---

FAQ:

1. No crypto
2. No tor
3. No Free DA License on these
4. No torrents
5. Yes you can run Nextcloud (don't expect SSD performance)
6. No you cannot upgrade later with the same discount level, this is 1 shot only.
7. No you cannot stack them.
8. Test IP/Download: http://148.163.68.178/1g.bin
9. DC: Ioflood (PhoenixNAP)
10. There is no IPv6 right now.
11. Yes you can install windows, you will need a valid license (although I can't imagine it will be much fun)
12. If you install from ISO make sure to set the drivers to virtio for disk and network for best performance and compatibility.
13. Refund policy is 48 hours only and only if this is your first purchase with Inception Hosting.
14. You can pay by Crypto, PayPal, Credit/Debit card.
15. This offer is for new orders only.
16. Orders are not being accepted from China or Brazil.
